entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is Harry's girlfriend who is upset and crying because she wants to talk about something but Harry doesn't want to.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is Cho's boyfriend who is trying to avoid talking to her about something.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends with whom he has talked about the issue.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another one of Harry's friends with whom he has talked about the issue and whom Cho thinks he wants to meet up with instead of her.

relationships.description: Harry is in a romantic relationship with Cho.
Harry has talked to Ron about the issue.
Harry has also talked to Hermione about the issue.
Cho is in a romantic relationship with Harry.
